entry.title: Re Bittrex 的立场与 Coinbase 一致，认为虽然加密资产的初始销售可能被视为证券，但一旦在二级市场交易，应将其视为商品或其他类型的数字资产。Bittrex 还强调...
entry.summary: Re Bittrex 的立场与 Coinbase 一致，认为虽然加密资产的初始销售可能被视为证券，但一旦在二级市场交易，应将其视为商品或其他类型的数字资产。Bittrex 还强调，SEC 在采取行动前没有提供充分的通知。https://cointelegraph.com/news/bittrex-challenges-sec-authority-crypto-lawsuit-seeks-dismissal

entry.title: 据 Cointelegraph，破产加密交易所 Bittrex 近日提交了一项动议，寻求驳回美国证券交易委员会（SEC）对其提起的诉讼。Bittrex 质疑 SEC 在没有国会明确授权的情...
entry.summary: 据 Cointelegraph，破产加密交易所 Bittrex 近日提交了一项动议，寻求驳回美国证券交易委员会（SEC）对其提起的诉讼。Bittrex 质疑 SEC 在没有国会明确授权的情况下，对加密货币进行监管的权威。

entry.summary:
Re 吴说获悉，Poly Network 发推表示，由于最近的一次攻击，Poly Network 暂时暂停服务。正在积极与相关方接洽，认真评估受影响资产的范围。欢迎网络安全专业人士的协助，以支持解决这个问题。非常感谢用户的理解，将及时通知有关此事件的最新进展。https://twitter.com/polynetwork2/status/1675384703149568001?s=46
Poly Network: Dear users, we would like to inform you that Poly Network is temporarily suspending its services due to a recent attack. We are actively engaging with relevant parties and diligently assessing the extent of the affected assets. 【1/3】

Lookonchain: It seems that #PolyNetwork was attacked again, hackers minted a lot of assets. Hackers have sold 94B $SHIB for 360 $ETH, 495M $COOK for 16 $ETH and 15M $RFuel for 27 $ETH. entry.summary: 吴说获悉，去中心化社交协议 Lens Protocol 发布 LIP-4 提案，LIP-4 提案将在 Lens Profile 中添加名为「Profile Guardian」的安全层，用于防范网络钓鱼骗局，禁用关键操作。用户可选择关闭此安全层，但需经过 7 天冷却期。

merp: Golf is the most competitive sport in the world. You don’t get an advantage for being tall, or strong, or quick. It’s all just skill that takes thousands of hours and millions of swings to hone. It is arguably the only pure skill based game

entry.summary: 如何用ChatGPT冲土狗? AI + Web3 最实用功能, 被@etherscan 实现了. 打开网站, 找到 Code Reader 配个OpenAI的Key, 然后找一个土狗合同, 地址粘贴进去, 让GPT分析代码有没有风险. 看不懂代码也没关系, 会打汉字就行. 明白了吗🫡 土狗地址在这: https://etherscan.io/token/0x1e3778dd6dbfdc1c5b89f95f7c098b21e80ec4fa#code https://t.co/bGuEd8BWFm

Re @hufhaus9 Devil is in the details. If blackrock doesn’t own BTC. But their clients own via blackrock 51% of the network, then a hardfork would make blackrock owner and give them choice https://twitter.com/jratcliff/status/1669937251286126592?s=46&t=cM-600GJga7XNxddNsm-Pw
